column2: The main responsibility of this role will be to create content strategies to promote our product and to attract new customers. It involves managing the affiliate programs through all the phases including brainstorming, launch, maintaining, trafficking, marketing, reporting, optimization and analysis.     As an affiliate marketer, you will be planning, developing and executing marketing programs that support and recruit new affiliates.      ?     You need to work with various internal teams and roll out different affiliate marketing initiatives. Some of these activities include performing marketing research on potential affiliate partners; monitoring affiliates and enforcing company procedures around affiliate programs; reviewing affiliate contracts, nurturing relationships with external vendors, affiliates and partners; and creating campaign reports that show progress and return on investment.     To succeed in this role, you ll need to have at least three years of experience in affiliate or content marketing.     Responsibilities:       Maintaining and developing affiliate marketing programs         Create a content strategy to promote affiliate products         Communicate with affiliate companies         Develop a content schedule and oversee content publishing         Compile newsletter reports         Monitoring Campaign performance. Compile traffic and revenue reports with Google Analytics         Use SEO tools to do keyword research and find new promotional opportunities         Test different types of content to maximize revenue       Requirements:       3+ years of experience in an Affiliate Marketing or similar position         Portfolio of successful affiliate marketing campaigns         Familiarity with affiliate marketing networks and search engine marketing         Bachelor s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field         Attention to detail and being data-driven         Strong communication and organizational skills         Proven project management skills         Familiarity with Google Analytics         Familiarity with different SEO tools
column11: CVS, Content strategy, Marketing programs, Publishing, Google Analytics, Project management, Research, SEO, Digital marketing, Monitoring

column2: Now let's help you understand your new role! About your new job responsibilities!!  1. Affiliate Program Management :  Develop, manage, and optimize affiliate marketing programs to drive traffic, conversions, and revenue for the company and its clients.  2. Client Relationship Management :  Act as the primary point of contact for Indian and international clients, ensuring effective communication and understanding of their needs, goals, and expectations.  3. Performance Analysis :  Analyse affiliate marketing campaign performance, interpret data, and derive actionable insights to optimize campaigns and drive continuous improvement.  4. Creative Strategy :  Develop innovative and engaging marketing strategies to capture and engage target audiences, fostering brand awareness and driving user acquisition.  5. Reporting :  Create comprehensive campaign reports, showcasing key performance metrics and outlining the impact of affiliate marketing initiatives to clients and internal stakeholders.  6 . Affiliate Recruitment :  Identify and onboard new affiliates and partners to expand the affiliate network and leverage their capabilities to drive results.  7. Compliance Monitoring :  Ensure compliance with affiliate marketing guidelines, policies, and regulations, both for the company and its clients.  8. Budget Management :  Manage campaign budgets efficiently to achieve maximum ROI and track campaign expenses.  What Makes You a Great Fit ?  1. Experience :  You have at least 2 years of hands-on experience in performance marketing, with a strong focus on affiliate marketing strategies and brand awareness campaigns.  2. Technical Knowledge :  You possess in-depth knowledge of affiliate marketing platforms like Hasoffer, Trackier, or Affise, enabling you to effectively manage and optimize campaigns.  3. Client Handling :  Your experience in handling both Indian and international clients showcase your ability to build and maintain strong client relationships.  4. Analytical Skills :  Your strong analytical skills empower you to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions to enhance campaign performance.  5. Communication :  Your excellent written and verbal communication skills enable you to present campaign strategies and results to clients and internal stakeholders effectively.  6. Creativity :  Your creative thinking allows you to develop innovative marketing strategies that resonate with the target audience and drive results.  7. Organization :  Your strong organizational and project management skills equip you to handle multiple campaigns simultaneously while meeting deadlines.  8. Bachelor's Degree :  Your engineering degree from a tier 1 or 2 college showcases your academic background and commitment to excellence.  If you possess the right blend of experience, technical expertise, communication skills, and creative thinking, this role of an Affiliate Manager in our digital marketing team could be the perfect fit for you. You will have the opportunity to work with a diverse set of clients, manage and optimize affiliate marketing campaigns, and contribute to our clients' success in the competitive digital landscape. Join us and be a key player in driving growth and success through effective performance marketing strategies. - Freshers with BTECH Degree can also apply. (Premium Institute Preferred).
column11: Affiliate Marketing, eCommerce, Budget Management, Digital Marketing, Campaign Management, Marketing, CRM

column2: Creating, developing & implementing effective long- and short-term paid search strategies with good ROAS.              Managing PPC budgets, while strengthening platform accounts and key client relationships.              Executing & optimizing multiple PPC campaigns simultaneously.              Overseeing campaigns across a number of search platforms (e.g. Google Ads, Amazon Ads, Social Media ads, Bing).              Targeting selected groups through keyword and audience research.              Managing and editing campaign budgets and adjusting bids to optimize ROAS.              Tracking daily, weekly & monthly KPIs to identify opportunities for improvement or more efficient spend.              Reporting KPIs to management on a regular basis via various dashboards.              Producing engaging clear and concise copy for campaigns.              Ensuring campaigns are aligned across multiple channels, avoiding wasted spend or crossover.              Reducing risk of click fraud and irrelevant spend.              Staying up-to-date with PPC/SEM trends and techniques, and applying them where relevant        .            Generating maximum leads/conversions within the designated budget.              Research and analyze competitor ads, keywords, and strategies using a variety of tools like aHrefs, SEMRush, Spyfu, etc.                  Requirements    :            Must be well versed with all types of campaigns across all ad platforms: CPL, CPA, CPM, CPC, CPI, and CPV.              Experience in data analysis and reporting.              Familiarity with multiple platforms (e.g. Google, Facebook, Linkedin & Quora Ads ) is preferred.              Working knowledge of analytics tools (Google Analytics, Tableau, WebTrends etc).              In-depth knowledge of running B2B and B2C all types of campaigns.              Maintain and monitor keyword bids, account daily and monthly budget caps, impression share, quality score, and other important account metrics.
column11: Data analysis, PPC, PPC Executive, Google Analytics, Social media, SEM, Budgeting, Research, Management, Monitoring

column2: About Digidarts We (Digidarts) are India's pioneer performance-driven 360 digital marketing agency. Our plethora of e-commerce and app-focused services have helped 200+ brands (including Meesho, DealShare, VOGO, Flexnest, Birkenstock, Slay Coffee) hailing from diverse industry verticals (FMCG, B2B, D2C, Social Commerce, B2C, Healthtech, Edtech, Fintech, Fashion Apparel, Lifestyle) to acquire more users, drive higher sales, and achieve cost optimization goals.Being a Google Premium and Facebook Marketing Partner, we have marked our presence for 8+ years by revolutionizing the way brands (Pan India & Global Brands) perceive Digital Marketing. Over the years, the organization has bagged many notable awards for delivering exceptionally path-breaking outcomes to numerous leading brands. Time, Growth, Empathy, and Innovation are our four pillars that enrich brands and the digital ecosystem in the country. About the Role: Your role as Assistant Manager - App Delivery will require you to join our Affiliate team. The candidate should be able to maintain strong relationships between clients & agency teams. This role will directly report to AVP  Affiliate  What You'll Do: Job Description  Through understanding of CPM / CPI / CPS Mode of Operations.   Handle and manage affiliates to execute campaigns.   Plan and formulate monthly media plans & budgets for affiliates.   Monitor day to day progress of campaigns and formulating daily plans for Digidarts partners.  Conduct outreach activities through LinkedIn and Skype to onboard partners and facilitate their onboarding process.  Will be responsible to effectively buy media, negotiate rates, positions to ensure clients gets best performance.   Research and identify top apps in the industry to engage potential partners effectively. What we need Professional Attributes  Desired Experience: Min 2+ years in App/ Mobile Delivery   Must have experience in 3rd Party attribution platforms/MMP and S2S integrations.  Educational Qualification: Any graduate Personal Attributes  Persistent with a high sense of ownership   Strong interpersonal and influencing skills, with a closure mindset  Demonstrate ability to work in a fast paced, hyper-normal growth environment  Join us and write the future of Digital Marketing.

column2: We are looking for experienced affiliate Managers with a proven track record in handling performance led digital campaigns. A suitable candidate would be someone who is self-motivated, self-starter with strong experience in driving large scale campaigns, performance management, optimization, reporting, analytics and affiliate management skills with good industry connections.  Job Responsibilities: - kick start affiliate marketing for Spinny - Developing and monitoring affiliate promotions - Reporting for affiliate marketing promotions and activity - Identifying and implementing other opportunities to enhance the affiliate program - Keeping affiliates up to date on new products and any program enhancements - Continually motivating affiliates to perform better - Setting in-house affiliate management system - Monitoring and reporting on competitors- affiliate campaigns and promotions Technical Expertise : - Hands-on understanding of the affiliate ecosystem; ideally large scale platform experiences. - Good knowledge in working with 3rd party affiliate platforms. - A good understanding of Earned Media would be an advantage - Be the gate keeper of excellence in delivering quality performance and should possess the hunger for growth.
column11: Affiliate marketing, New Product Development, Campaign Management, Digital Marketing, Sales Promotion, Marketing
